title: Cancel a Ticket?
body: I put in a riot support ticket for something I thought I needed help with, and now I want to close/cancel it. Is there any way to do that? Is there a way so Riot reads the extra stuff I added after saying not to worry about it? Thanks! :)

replies.body: If you sent an update to your ticket about not needing help, you should get a quick reply before the ticket is closed as soon as an agent picks it up.
Ok, did that! Thanks very much! Haven't received a reply yet but I'm sure I will! Thanks! :)
